RPS: General Commentary

Stokes to Morris, SIX, wallops this several continents wide of leg side! Back of a length, angled in at middle stump. He stands tall and crashes this over the midwicket boundary to cap off one of the best cameos you will ever see.

Stokes to Morris, SIX, there's no Braithwaite, but that doesn't mean safety for Stokes. Overpitched at leg stump, maintains his shape and uses the pace to lift this gracefully over the square leg boundary
Stokes to Morris, FOUR, oh, take a bow Morris. This is a good ball - yorker down the leg side. He's backed away and tapped this past backward point who dives to his right but can't get to it
Stokes to Morris, 2 runs, full at leg stump, chips it in front of deep midwicket, who doesn't run in quickly enough coz he has lost it in the lights. Two runs as a result
Stokes to Morris, FOUR, slower ball, good length at the pads, waits and waits before lifting it past short fine leg
Stokes to Anderson, 1 run, full at off stump, gets it off the bottom as he tries to heave this over long-on, finds him on the bounce instead CH Morris A Zampa CJ Anderson AB Dinda

Zampa to Morris, FOUR, this is fabulous from Morris. That is the best looking 16 off 4 you'll see. This is full outside off stump, he holds his shape and somehow mixes class with belligerence as he lifts it inside-out and finds the extra cover boundary on the bounce
Zampa to Morris, SIX, oh this is huge! Picks the slider that's coming in at leg stump, brings the full swing out and lifts it on the up over deep midwicket. 102 metres
Zampa to Morris, 2 runs, short outside off stump, chops this to sweeper cover's right
Zampa to Morris, FOUR, smart. Good length at off stump, backs away and slaps this inside- out over extra cover

Zampa to Samson, OUT, and he's gone next ball. Short ball at middle stump, keeps low and skids on to crash into middle-and-off as he goes for the pull SV Samson b Zampa 102 (82m 63b 8x4 5x6) SR: 161.90

Zampa to Samson, SIX, brings up his hundred with a six! Magnificent innings, great shot. This is tossed up at middle stump, clears the front leg, waits for it to land and lifts this straight and high over the bowler Zampa SV Samson AB Dinda CJ Anderson Imran Tahir
Dinda to Samson, 1 run, oh what a shot. But it's only one. This is back of a length at off stump, he punches this off the back foot, straight over the bowler, but long-off gets to it on the bounce
Dinda to Samson, FOUR, low full toss outside off stump, puts a stride across, watches it closely and paddles it nicely past short fine leg And this is highest score in all T20 cricket
Dinda to Samson, SIX, brilliant. Anticipates the bouncer, backs away to make room and nails the hook shot over the square leg boundary
Dinda to Samson, no run, well-directed bouncer, aimed at the throat, he sways away from it and lets it go

Dinda to Samson, 2 runs, overpitched at off stump, clears the front leg and hammers this past the bowler's face, but Chahar puts in a brilliant effort, sliding to his right at long-off, to keep it to two
Dinda to Samson, SIX, what a shot. Length ball at off stump, stands tall, uses his wrists to lift this on the up over the long-off boundary Dinda SV Samson Imran Tahir CJ Anderson BA Stokes
Imran Tahir to Samson, 1 run, full at leg stump, pushed to deep midwicket
Imran Tahir to Samson, 2 runs, another slider, back of a length at off stump, opens the face and squeezes it past point on the up
Imran Tahir to Samson, SIX, slider, full at the legs, he's composed and maintains his shape as he lifts this over deep midwicket
Imran Tahir to Anderson, 1 run, googly, good length at off stump, leans in and pushes with soft hands to point
Imran Tahir to Anderson, 1 wide, googly, good length, too wide outside off stump
Imran Tahir to Samson, 1 run, good length, slider at leg stump, pushed on the up to long-on
Imran Tahir to Samson, no run, good length outside off, slams it on the up, straight back to the bowler on the bounce CJ Anderson BA Stokes SV Samson A Zampa
Stokes to Anderson, no run, good length, angles in at off stump and straightens after pitching. Beats the outside edge
Stokes to Anderson, no run, full at off stump, mistimed drive, straight to extra cover
Stokes to Samson, 1 run, back of a length at off stump, nicely in control of this, slaps across the line off the middle of the bat, straight to deep square
Stokes to Samson, FOUR, short ball, angled in at the chest, just about gets up and shovels this wide of fine leg

Stokes to Pant, OUT, direct hit! Great fielding from Mayank Agarwal. This is in the blockhole, wide outside off stump. Pant squeezes it out to Mayank at point, and takes off for the run. But the pick-up-and-release is quick, and it's straight at the stumps. No need for the third umpire there, he was well short RR Pant run out 31 (30m 22b 1x4 2x6) SR: 140.90
Stokes to Samson, 1 run, good length, slower ball angled in at off stump, inside edge onto pad and straight to point SV Samson A Zampa RR Pant BA Stokes
Zampa to Samson, 1 run, good length at middle stump, pushed on the up to long-on

Zampa to Samson, SIX, gets it off the bottom of the bat, but over the long-off fielder. Only a moral victory for the bowler, who tosses it up at off stump and draws the hard, anxious hands of the batsman. He doesn't connect at all, but that's six
Zampa to Samson, no run, back of a length outside off, punched straight to extra cover off the back foot
Zampa to Samson, no run, low full toss, gets the bottom of the bat, straight to extra cover
Zampa to Samson, 2 runs, tossed up at off stump, driven inside-out, wide of long-off
Zampa to Samson, 2 runs, dropped short at middle stump, goes deep and punches this between deep midwicket and long-on RR Pant BA Stokes SV Samson Imran Tahir
Stokes to Pant, no run, in the blockhole outside off stump, jammed out to to extra cover
Stokes to Samson, 1 run, good length, angled in at off stump. Plays an unconvincing slog across the line and it loops and lands just in front of Rahane at long-on. But that is fifty for Samson.
Stokes to Samson, no run, good length outside off stump, drives on the up and finds point
Stokes to Pant, 1 run, slower ball, good length at middle stump, pushes to deep midwicket on the up
Stokes to Samson, 1 run, back of a length, heavy ball gets him high on the bat as he goes for the pull. In the air briefly before rolling to long-on

Stokes to Pant, 1 run, full and angled down leg side, stays put and tickles this to fine leg where Dinda over runs, but gets down just in time to get his body behind it as he tumbles SV Samson Imran Tahir RR Pant R Bhatia
Imran Tahir to Samson, no run, full at off stump, stock ball this time, he finds extra cover once again with the push
Imran Tahir to Samson, no run, googly, full outside off, leans in and drives to extra cover
Imran Tahir to Pant, 1 run, good length, spinning in at off stump, pushed to deep midwicket
Imran Tahir to Pant, no run, good length, googly, off stump, slides past the outside edge as he pokes at this
Imran Tahir to Pant, 2 runs, googly, short and wide outside off, mistimes the cut shot but gets it past point and to sweeper's right
Imran Tahir to Samson, 1 run, good length, slider angled in at leg stump, no feet, pushed on the up to long-on SV Samson R Bhatia RR Pant A Zampa
Bhatia to Samson, 1 run, back of a length outside off stump, driven on the up, straight to Rahane at extra cover who misfields and gives away a run
Bhatia to Pant, 1 run, full outside off, driven straight to extra cover
Bhatia to Pant, SIX, this is full and slow outside off stump, reaches out for this and slaps across the line, flat and over the long-on boundary
Bhatia to Samson, 1 run, leg cutter skids in and takes the inside edge onto pad, struck in front of the stumps, but umpire has seen bat
Bhatia to Pant, 1 run, good length at off stump, fingers rolled on this one, he steps out and adjusts to drop this into the off side

Bhatia to Pant, SIX, first six of the match. Overpitched at off stump, it's not his trademark slower ball either. Like a throwdown for Pant, who uses his bat swing to lift this over the sight screen RR Pant A Zampa SV Samson R Bhatia
Zampa to Pant, 1 run, more wary of the spin this time, hangs back, waits for it spin into him from outside off and chops it to deep cover
Zampa to Pant, no run, wrong'un, good length, he doesn't pick it and swats across the line. This slides through and beats him
Zampa to Pant, FOUR, full at middle stump, hammered powerfully past the bowler, all along the ground, and long-on has no chance
Zampa to Pant, no run, googly, good length, spins away from off stump, pushed back to the bowler
Zampa to Samson, 1 run, good length at middle stump, miscues the sweep shot, under edge to deep square
Zampa to Pant, 1 run, tossed up at leg stump, drives it wide of deep midwicket SV Samson R Bhatia RR Pant Imran Tahir
Bhatia to Samson, no run, back of a length outside off, pokes at it, inside edge onto boot, lobs up for Dhoni who doesn't get a hand to it
Bhatia to Pant, 1 run, slower ball, back of a length at off stump, chips it to find long-on
Bhatia to Samson, 1 run, good length at middle stump, shoveled to deep midwicket on the up
Bhatia to Pant, 1 run, off cutter, good length at off stump, but not spinning away quickly enough as he closes the faces and dabs it into the midwicket area
Bhatia to Samson, 1 run, full at leg stump, driven to deep midwicket's left

Bhatia to Pant, 1 run, dropped short at middle stump, it doesn't sit up, slides low but Pant is in control of the pull shot, finds long leg Bhatia RR Pant Imran Tahir SV Samson A Zampa Pant's scores when batting first last year - 4, 2, 4, 1
Imran Tahir to Pant, 1 run, slider, good length, off stump, pushed on the up to deep midwicket
Imran Tahir to Samson, 1 run, googly outside off stump at a length, picks it and pushes it to long-on off the front foot
Imran Tahir to Pant, 1 run, good length at middle stump, waits for the turn, pushes to deep midwicket
Imran Tahir to Samson, 1 run, good length at middle stump, goes deep in the crease and taps it to deep midwicket
Imran Tahir to Pant, 1 run, nearly gets him first ball. Googly, full and wide outside off, Pant wants to start with a six yet again. Huge heave at this, bat turns and one hand comes off, but

Imran Tahir to Billings, OUT, slides through and takes off stump. A slider from Tahir, targeted at off stump from a length. Billings gives him a premeditated charge and isn't to the pitch. Big gap between angled bat and body, stumps are shattered. And you know what Tahir is doing SW Billings b Imran Tahir 24 (42m 17b 4x4 0x6) SR: 141.17 SV Samson A Zampa SW Billings Imran Tahir
Zampa to Samson, no run, good length, angled in at middle stump, bunted back down the pitch, one bounce, straight to the bowler
Zampa to Samson, no run, short outside off, zips up after pitching and beats the outside edge on the attempted late cut
Zampa to Samson, no run, flat at off stump, skids in with the angle and takes the inside half of the bat as he pushes at it, back to the bowler
Zampa to Samson, 2 runs, full at off stump, gets to the pitch with a short stride and drives it past extra cover, sweeper has to run a long way
Zampa to Samson, 2 runs, full and flighted at off stump, leans in and drives it to long-off's left
Zampa to Billings, 1 run, tossed up, in the blockhole at leg stump, toe-ended push to the bowler's right Zampa SV Samson Imran Tahir SW Billings DL Chahar
Imran Tahir to Samson, no run, good length at off stump, pushed back to the bowler
Imran Tahir to Billings, 1 run, full at middle stump, steps out and flicks it to deep square's left
Imran Tahir to Samson, 1 run, good length outside off stump, dropped into the off side off the front foot
Imran Tahir to Billings, 1 run, tossed up at middle stump, gives him the charge, not to the pitch, whipped to deep square leg
Imran Tahir to Billings, no run, good length, skids through quick and low, and the batsman just about gets an inside edge. He was trapped in front without it
Imran Tahir to Samson, 1 leg bye, wrong'un, good length, climbs and hits him high on the leg in front of middle stump, appeal is turned down SV Samson DL Chahar SW Billings BA Stokes
Chahar to Samson, 1 run, slower ball, back of a length at middle stump, rides the bounce and drops it in front of short fine - you know who is there - to get the single
Chahar to Billings, 1 run, full at the toes, he clips this straight to Dinda after hitting either side of him the previous two balls
Chahar to Billings, FOUR, back of a length at the pads, no need to move this time. Springs upright and whips it to Dinda's right this time, and he has no chance

Chahar to Billings, FOUR, slower ball angled down at leg stump, gives him the charge and goes for the slog again. Thick inside edge runs past Dinda at short fine, who gives chase and puts in a fantasy park slide that is never going to help him cut it off
Chahar to Billings, FOUR, good length at off stump, hangs back in the crease and spanks this across the line, on the up, wide of mid-on
Chahar to Billings, 1 wide, gives him the charge, induces a bouncer that is too short, lets it go
Chahar to Billings, no run, good length outside off, bat turns as he attempts to push this on the up into the cover region SV Samson BA Stokes SW Billings DL Chahar
Stokes to Samson, 2 runs, good length, angled into the pads, elegantly pushed on the up to square leg's left
Stokes to Billings, 1 run, full and wide outside off, jammed down to third man off the toe end
Stokes to Samson, 1 run, good length at off stump, walks across his stumps and pushes to mid-on. Sensible cricket, they've packed the off side field for him
Stokes to Samson, no run, back of a length at middle stump, whipped to midwicket on the up
Stokes to Samson, no run, nearly chips this to cover point. Full at off stump, he opens the face once again, but can't get the timing right. Slices it just short of Mayank

Stokes to Samson, FOUR, he's made a real estate investment in the off side. Good length in the corridor, short stride, opens the face and squeezes it past backward point Stokes SV Samson DL Chahar SW Billings AB Dinda
Chahar to Samson, 1 run, back of a length at off stump, tapped uppishly to mid-on with no feet, single
Chahar to Samson, 1 wide, attempted slower ball, full and angled down the leg side
Chahar to Samson, no run, good length at off stump, driven on the up into the off side
Chahar to Billings, 1 run, edged, but safe. He's keeping that away swing going. Full at off stump, no feet from Billings. Tries to close the face on this, gets a leading edge to third man
Chahar to Samson, 1 run, good length outside off, slaps it on the up to sweeper's right
Chahar to Samson, 2 runs, full and shaping away from outside off, walks into the shot, gets to the pitch and pushes it to sweeper cover's right SV Samson AB Dinda SW Billings DL Chahar
Dinda to Samson, 1 run, short and wide, cuts hard, but it lands just short of Stokes at backward point. He parries it wide to cut the momentum, concedes a single
Dinda to Billings, 1 run, full at off stump, driven on the up to mid-off's left
Dinda to Billings, FOUR, short and wide, sits up nicely for Billings who throws his arms at this, gets a thick outside edge that flies over slip and takes a couple of bounces into the boundary
Dinda to Billings, 1 wide, full, swinging, well wide outside off

Dinda to Samson, 1 run, brilliant fielding. This is back of a length at off stump, rides the bounce and punches it in front of square, but point is quickly across to his right and puts in a dive to stop that one-handed
Dinda to Samson, FOUR, full at off stump, leans in and executes yet another square drive to perfection, past a diving point's left
Dinda to Samson, FOUR, back of a length at off stump, stands tall and whips it in front of square with the front leg raised SV Samson DL Chahar SW Billings AB Dinda
Chahar to Samson, 1 run, back of a length, angled in at off stump, dropped into the off side off the back foot
Chahar to Samson, FOUR, oh beautiful. This is fuller than the last, same line. Samson leans in this time before using those wrists to get it past point once again
Chahar to Samson, FOUR, full and swinging away from the corridor, keeps his feet rooted, but uses his wrists to squeeze it past backward point on the up
Chahar to Billings, 1 run, walks at the ball, gets behind the line as it swings away from a length and closes the face to tap it wide of mid-on
Chahar to Samson, 1 leg bye, good length, brings it in sharply this time, raps him on the thigh guard as he looks to flick it It's Samson at No. 3. A wide slip in place still

Chahar to Tare, OUT, edged and gone! Full ball, swinging away nicely after starting at off stump. Has him poking in the corridor and moves just enough to kiss the outside edge SW Billings AB Dinda AP Tare
Dinda to Billings, no run, short and wide outside off, may have been a wide if Billings hadn't walked forward and across. He lets it go
Dinda to Billings, no run, good length, moving away from outside off, leans in to cover the off stump and lets it go
Dinda to Tare, 1 leg bye, back of a length, nips back in and thuds into his thigh guard as he looks to flick
Dinda to Tare, 1 wide, short ball, swings away, just inside the wide marker, but the leg umpire has wided that on height as Tare lets it go
Dinda to Tare, no run, short and wide outside off, keeps low and slides from under the bat as he cuts
Dinda to Tare, no run, back of a length outside off, skids through with some movement away, chopped straight to Stokes at backward point Faf is at fly slip
Dinda to Tare, no run, back of a length outside off stump, slight movement away, left alone CH Morris BA Stokes CJ Anderson A Zampa
